```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, knitr, lubridate)

# Utility functions from:
# https://github.com/mfherman/westchester-covid/blob/master/R/build/utils.R

day_month_year <- function(x, abbr = FALSE) {
  if(all(lubridate::is.Date(x) || lubridate::is.POSIXt(x))) {
  glue::glue("{lubridate::day(x)} {lubridate::month(x, label = TRUE, abbr = abbr)} {lubridate::year(x)}")
  } else
    stop("Input vector must be Date or POSIX format.")
}

pretty_time <- function(x) {
  if(all(lubridate::is.POSIXt(x))) {
  paste(as.numeric(format(x, "%I")), format(x, "%M %p"), sep = ":")
  } else
    stop("Input vector must be POSIX format.")
}

```

The Lichess4545 leagues are popular online chess leagues that have been running since 2015. They're regularly recommended by top players like IM [John Bartholomew](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sORvXN2tKZQ&t=410s). Find out more at https://www.lichess4545.com/.

This site presents various unofficial compilations of stats by league and season. All content is presented for general interest purposes only.
